section.p: This template groups related functional status observations into categories (e.g., mobility, self-care).

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-14361, CONF:1098-14362, CONF:1098-32569 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.66"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Functional Status Result Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.66)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-14364)
The code selected should indicate the category that groups the contained functional status evaluation observations (e.g., mobility, self-care, communication).
/code SHOULD be selected from ICF (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.254) OR LOINC (2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:1098-31417)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-14358)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-31434)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-31585)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it (CONF:1098-14359, CONF:1098-14368)
Conforms to Functional Status Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.67:2014-06-09)

SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it (CONF:1098-31432, CONF:1098-31433)
Conforms to Self Care Activities (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.128)
SHALL conform to Result Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.1)
SHALL conform to Functional Status Result Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.66)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14355, R2.0=1098-14355)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14357, R2.0=1098-14357)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14363, R2.0=CONF:1098-14363)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-14364)
/code SHOULD be selected from ICF (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.254) OR LOINC (2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:1098-31417)
The code selected should indicate the category that groups the contained functional status evaluation observations (e.g., mobility, self-care, communication).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-14358)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-31434)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-31585)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it (CONF:1098-14359, CONF:1098-14368)
Conforms to Functional Status Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.67:2014-06-09)

SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it (CONF:1098-31432, CONF:1098-31433)
Conforms to Self Care Activities (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.128)

The value for 'code' in a result organizer SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12). Laboratory results SHOULD be from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or other constrained terminology named by the US Department of Health and Human Services Office of National Coordinator or other federal agency. Local and/or regional codes for laboratory results SHOULD also be allowed. (CONF:7164)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" Cluster (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) OR SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="BATTERY" Battery (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7165)
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @code should be selected from ICF (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.254) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:14747, CONF:14748)
/code SHOULD be selected from ICF (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.254) OR LOINC (2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:1098-31417)

<assignedAuthor/> </author> </observation> </component> </organizer>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:14361, CONF:14362 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.66"

Consol Functional Status Result Organizer code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @code should be selected from ICF (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.254) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:14747, CONF:14748)
SHALL conform to Result Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.1)
Consol Functional Status Result Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14355, R2.0=1098-14355)
Consol Functional Status Result Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14357, R2.0=1098-14357)
Consol Functional Status Result Organizer SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14363, R2.0=CONF:1098-14363)
Consol Functional Status Result Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14364)
Consol Functional Status Result Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:14358)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus)

Consol Functional Status Result Organizer SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it (CONF:14359, CONF:14368) Conforms to Functional Status Result Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.67)
